channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Wrong-way rover: Dog rescued from a busy Boston tunnel during rush hour
item.description: Massachusetts state police came to the rescue when a dog wandered into a tunnel in Boston and narrowly escaped being hit by traffic

item.title: Connecticut Gov. Ned Lamont to seek third term in 2026
item.description: Connecticut Gov. Ned Lamont says he plans to seek a third term in 2026

item.title: Cornell University to pay $60M in deal with Trump admin to restore federal funding
item.description: Cornell University has agreed to pay $60 million and accept the Trump administrationâ€™s interpretation of civil rights laws in order to restore federal...

item.title: 2 more men charged in FBI investigation related to alleged Halloween plot in Michigan
item.description: Authorities have charged two more young men in a sprawling federal investigation of an alleged terrorism-style attack planned for suburban Detroit

item.title: 'No hire' job market leaves unemployed in limbo as threats to economy multiply
item.description: The unemployment rate is low and the economy is still growing, but those out of work face the slowest pace of hiring in more than a decade
